attributes.title: I can't believe this.
attributes.review: I downloaded this app, because I thought it seemed like a good idea. But as soon as I downloaded it, my cellphone started having issues. I cannot even use other apps like Facebook or YouTube. I think this app is awful and MUST be removed from the App Store. Apple should always offer quality to its users, not this pitiful application. I hope everyone has a great day. ğŸ¤—

attributes.title: this app gave me cancer
attributes.review: immediately after I downloaded this disgusting piece of flaming garbage rotten egg app, I could feel the tumors growing all inside my body. lumps of flesh-eating orange and yellow blobs were forming at an atrociously fast rate. I was so frightened. I could actually see the bumps in my skin where the tumors were growing. my hair was falling out minutes after I had pressed the get button. and then all of a sudden, I became possessed. it was an incredibly horrifying experience. it lasted only six days but it felt like 666 years. I was jerking upright during 3:00am every single morning reciting satanic poetry. my sleep paralysis demon became a MAGA-hat-wearing toddler with melanoma who wouldnâ€™t stop screaming â€œI KNOW GOOD WORDS, I KNOW THE BEST WORDSâ€. I would repeatedly throw fits and refuse to wear a mask when going in public. my family and friends were so scared for my life. I began to lose my vision after the third day. I tried to sacrifice my two cats to donald j trump himself after the fourth day. I burned all of my pride flags in one gigantic bonfire on the fifth night, and then I tried to jump in it myself because the 2-hour trail run of mike pence conversion therapy hadnâ€™t worked earlier that morning. all I can say is that with the 1/100000000th ounce left of sanity I had in my body, I am so grateful to say that I was able to delete the app and make it out alive. god bless bernie sanders and may god burn this piece of absolute disgusting sewage app to the ground.

attributes.title: horrified
attributes.review: i downloaded the app so i could appreciate my senpai, daddy donald, in hopes he would notice me:( but when i entered my phone number, he was like lowkey stalking me. when i was giving my fish a bath, he broke into my house and peed on my grandmother. she literally died. then he gave my sister cancer. cancer isnâ€™t even contagious so bunker boy best be explainin. i tried to delete the app but then it said if i did it would kidnap my entire family and make them listen to gabbie hannas wanna be TÃ˜P music. like, wÃ˜aHâœ¨. i couldnâ€™t do that to them.he ended up blowing up my phone and now iâ€™m writing this review on my motherâ€™s ass. thank you donald.

You called people with color criminals! You made fun of a serious virus (Corona) calling it the Chinese virus which is very racist. And much more! You say youâ€™re doing good things when youâ€™re not! Are we not gonna talk about the wall?! Iâ€™ve hated you ever since you became president! You have done nothing good for us! People with color have been killed just for walking! Walking on the god da*n sidewalk! LGBTQ+ have been murder just because we arenâ€™t straight! Iâ€™m sorry that we love other genders! But you canâ€™t force love! Love is a force of nature! And nature is beautiful, unique and much more! And you turned it into something ugly! You expect us to stay quiet?! Thatâ€™s bullsh*t! My people and LGBTQ community will not stay quiet! We will never obey you and your stupid people because at the end of the day we will always be better than your stupid a** supports! Youâ€™ve done nothing good for us! Weâ€™ve had to suffer for years and probably more! Iâ€™ve never wish death upon someone but..I WISH YOU WOULD DIE!
